Shivah::


"First we should be sure that that virus doesn't spread in the 
blackFortress" said Shivah who opened his comm link to blaze"Blaze, I 
need that you send Silverscout to quarentyne's area and stay with 
her." and looking to Drillbit "Perhaps we should win time..." Shivah 
Opened comm link  to Lunarpine "Well maximal, regarding the situation 
I have an offer to give you are you ready to heard?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit/KitKat2::
> 
> DrillBit turned the situation over in his head. The base had been
> infiltrated by enemy bots, who had a deadly virus. There was a bot 
out
> side, who supposedly has the virus and the cure. He also had backup 
on
> the way.
> 
> KitKat tryed to think of a way out.
> "The easiest thing would be to kill the intruders, now, and wipe 
out the
> guy outside before his friends get here," says KitKat.
> 
> "In theory." DrillBit states, turning to Killfest and Shivah.
> "What do you two think?"
